summary: The fascinating life story of Sonny Liston, the controversial heavyweight boxing champion of the world.
cast: Ving Rhames|Stacey Dash|Nicholas Turturro|Bridgette Wilson-Sampras|David Proval|Rick Roberts|Alan Van Sprang|Egidio Tari|Andrew Hinkson|Troy Amos-Ross|Brian Paul|Gord Rand|Phillip Jarrett|Brian Frank|Philip Williams|Sean Mauricette|Pete Zedlacher|James Binkley|Mustafa Abdelkarim|Joseph Motiki|Pat Kelly|Stephen Lee Wright|Adrian Griffin|Nigel Shawn Williams|Ray Marsh|John Kalbhenn|Peter Wylie|Christopher Amos|Layton Morrison|Andelle Posival|Laura Wyatt|Raymond Olubawale|Mark Simmons|Daniella Tokic|Danielle Benton|Jennifer Donison|Natalie Gauvreau|Neven Pajkic|Amber Shonts
title: El gancho fantasma
